name: Time Up
description: Time Up is a fast paced action platformer, with each level only being 9 seconds. Sieze every opportunity, plan your route, Survive various deadly traps, and reach the finish line! This game combines a variety of classic platformer elements: The levels are carefully designed to make them harder, yet more enjoyable to give the player a...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
